recipe.name: Liquid Olive
recipe.ingredients: Basil, Olive Oil, Pine Nuts, Garlic, Parmesan Cheese
recipe.MethodOfCooking: Soak bread in water.  Add vinegar, oil, and salt. Blend until smooth. Add water as needed for consistency. Chill for 1 hour before serving.

recipe.name: Olive
recipe.ingredients: Pine Nuts, Garlic, Parmesan Cheese,Basil, Olive Oil
recipe.MethodOfCooking: Soak bread in water. Chop tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, onion, and garlic and add to blender. Squeeze water from bread and add to blender.

recipe.name: Chilly Olive
recipe.ingredients: Chill Nuts, Garlic nut, chilly Parmesan Cheese,Basil, Olive Oil
recipe.MethodOfCooking: Soak bread in water. Chop tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, onion, and garlic and add to blender. Squeeze water from bread and add to blender.

recipe.name: Spanish Omelette
recipe.ingredients: Potatoes, Onions, Eggs, Olive Oil, Salt
recipe.MethodOfCooking: Peel and slice potatoes and onions. Fry in olive oil until tender. Beat eggs with salt and add to pan. Cook until set. Flip omelette and cook until golden brown.

recipe.name: Paella
recipe.ingredients: Rice, Chicken, Shrimp, Tomatoes, Peppers, Onions, Garlic, Saffron, Chicken Broth
recipe.MethodOfCooking: Sear chicken and shrimp in a paella pan. Remove from pan and set aside. Saute onions, peppers.

recipe.name: Gazpacho
recipe.ingredients: Tomatoes, Cucumber, Bell Pepper, Onion, Garlic, Bread, Vinegar, Olive Oil, Salt
recipe.MethodOfCooking: Add vinegar, oil, and salt. Blend until smooth. Add water as needed for consistency. Chill for 1 hour before serving.
